## cilium-dbg sysdump

Provide instructions on dumping cluster-wide system state

```
cilium-dbg sysdump [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for sysdump
```

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
```
